content: for all the stardew valley fans i made a pattern to create your own chickens inside you can find a step-by-step instruction guide on how to make a chicken sleeping or awake and an egg no sewing required using thin yarn and a 2mm hook my chickens are 3 5cm tall and 3 5 cm wide the eggs are 1 5cm tall and 1 2 cm wide with different yarns and hooks you can have different results ___________ contains - **desktop version** 2 pdfs with pictures in english and italian - ️**printable version** 1 pdf without pictures to print 1 pdf pictures only as reference for the printed one i d love to see your plushies share a photo on instagram tagging me @dragonsyarn ___________ pattern design © 2024 susanna berra dragon s yarn all rights reserved the pattern is for personal use only do not sell or reproduce the pattern or parts of it you can sell items made from this pattern as long as they are handmade by yourself in limited number and you give me credit as the designer susanna berra dragon s yarn - @dragonsyarn
